name: Campaign Planning & Launch
description: Plan and launch a multi-channel marketing campaign from concept to execution. Includes audience definition, messaging development, channel selection, creative briefs, timeline management, and launch coordination.

painPoints: Too many goals for one campaign
Research takes time away from execution
Limited historical data on channel performance

currentProcess.description: Create campaign brief and creative requirements
Build campaign timeline and task assignments
Set up campaigns in platforms and QA

aiProcess.description: Clarify objectives and define success metrics
aiProcess.toolRationale: Claude helps structure clear, measurable objectives
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Campaign brief with SMART objectives and KPIs
tips: Define what success looks like quantitatively

aiProcess.toolRationale: Perplexity provides real-time competitive and market research
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Audience insights and competitive campaign analysis
tips: Look for audience pain points and triggers

aiProcess.toolRationale: Claude excels at strategic messaging frameworks
aiProcess.expectedOutput: 3 messaging directions with value props and proof points

aiProcess.description: Recommend channel mix and budget allocation
aiProcess.toolRationale: Claude can reason about channel selection based on objectives
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Recommended channel mix with budget allocation rationale
tips: Provide historical channel performance if available

aiProcess.description: Create campaign brief and creative specs
aiProcess.toolRationale: ChatGPT writes clear, comprehensive creative briefs
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Complete creative brief for design team/agency
Campaign timeline with milestones and owners

aiProcess.description: Review and iterate on creative (manual + AI)
aiProcess.toolRationale: Human review needed; AI helps with quick copy iterations
Manual platform work; AI can help generate UTM parameters
Gemini analyzes early performance data quickly
aiProcess.expectedOutput: Launch performance summary with optimization recommendations
tips: Set up real-time dashboards before launch

whyItMatters: Campaigns drive revenue and brand awareness. A well-planned campaign maximizes ROI and builds brand equity. A poorly planned one wastes budget and damages brand perception.
commonMistakes: Too many objectives - focus on 1-2 primary goals
Skipping audience research - leads to generic messaging
Underestimating timeline - campaigns always take longer than expected
Not having clear KPIs - makes optimization impossible
Launching without QA - broken tracking ruins measurement
tips: Use AI to generate multiple messaging directions - then test them
Ask AI to critique your campaign brief before sharing with creative team
Build a 'campaign template' in your project management tool
Create a launch checklist that you reuse for every campaign
